paper_abstract: In this paper, we obtain the expression of the solutions of the following recursive sequences x(n+1) = x(n-2)x(n-4)/x(n-1)(+/-1 +/- x(n-2)x(n-4)), n = 0,1, ..., where the initial conditions are arbitrary non zero real numbers. Also, we study the behavior of the solution of these equations.
paper_title: Behavior and Expression of the Solutions of Some Rational Difference Equations
